<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/pay/barcode"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Pay a bill by passing the transaction barcode value in the requisition body.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PaymentSlipPayBarcodeRequestBody","description":"","required":["amount","barcode","clientRequestId","payer"],"type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"format":"int32","description":"The transaction amount.","type":"integer"},"barcode":{"description":"Barcode value.","type":"string"},"clientRequestId":{"description":"The unique transaction identification given by the client side. This value can't be repeated.","type":"string"},"payer":{"description":"Payer Information.","required":["name","taxId"],"properties":{"name":{"description":"Payer Name.","type":"string"},"taxId":{"description":"Tax Identification - CPF (11 digits formatted) or CNPJ (14 digits formatted), fill with zeros left of the number if necessary.","type":"string"}}},"tags":{"description":"A list with tags.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"example":{"amount":0,"barcode":"string","clientRequestId":"string","payer":{"name":"string","taxId":"string"},"tags":["string"]}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
